detail_desc: Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Trainers in patterned scuba fabric with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, a padded top edge and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Shirt in soft washed viscose twill with a collar, concealed buttons and a seam at the front. Wrapover back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Cap in cotton twill with an embroidered detail on the front and an adjustable strap with a metal fastening at the back.
Jacket in washed denim with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, buttons down the front, side pockets and flap chest pockets with a button. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in draped jersey with a stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back and long sleeves.
Fancy dress mask in moulded plastic with embroidered appliqués and sparkly stones on the front and silk ribbons at the back.
Cold shoulder top in soft jersey with a flounce at the top, narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Loose fit with smocking at the hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Dungaree dress in cotton twill with an open chest pocket and flounce trimmed straps with adjustable buttoning at the front.
Metal earrings in various designs. Size approx. 0.3-1.2 cm.
Small suede shoulder bag with fringing, a zip and narrow shoulder strap at the top and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5x16x22 cm.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequin motif on the front, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tunic in an airy, patterned weave with a round neck and button placket. Long raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and frayed, raw-edge hem.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Plastic smartphone case with a transparent back and coloured trims.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Chest pocket, side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and slim legs with a gentle flare to the hem.
Dress in soft ribbed jersey with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Small stand-up collar, sleeves with a frill with overlocked edges, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Top in soft, striped cotton jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Baseball jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with appliqués and a print motif. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and jetted front pockets. Contrasting colour sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems. Soft brushed inside to help retain warmth.
Suede sandals with covered block heels, open toes and a narrow, adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Short satin shorts with flounces at the front and an elasticated waist.

Waist bag in sturdy, textured imitation leather with a zip at the top, an outer compartment with a flap and press-stud and two card slots at the front. Adjustable metal chain that fastens around the waist. Unlined. Width 29 cm.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Sleeveless, straight-cut top in airy cotton poplin with a collar, concealed zip at the back and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Treggings in stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Jumper in rib-knit cotton with a polo neck and long raglan sleeves. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Elastic scrunchies in various designs.
Round-neck jumper in an airy, fine-knit viscose blend containing glittery threads. Long sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft cotton jersey.
Transparent silicone smartphone case with an adjustable fabric neck cord.
Straight-style top in sturdy, striped cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and concealed hook and eye at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist with a drawstring that can be pulled to tighten from the sides.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Leggings in sturdy, stretch jersey with a slight sheen. High waist with belt loops and a chunky zip at one side. Extra-long legs with decorative and flatlock seams and a chunky zip at the front of the hems.
Lightweight trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and tapered legs. One pair with an all-over print.

Shirt in washed cotton denim with a turn-down collar, classic front with press-studs and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Trousers in woven fabric with decorative seams, a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, and slightly slimmer, gently flared legs that finish just above the ankles.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Boots in semi-shiny imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Lightweight trainers in mesh and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Linings and moulded insoles in mesh, and chunky soles.
Short, A-line dress in a viscose weave with a deep V-neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, narrow elastication at the cuffs, and gathered, asymmetric seams for added width. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in marled cotton jersey with short sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist with a drawstring that ties at the sides and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Large metal earrings with faceted plastic beads. Diameter approx. 3.5 cm.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Ankle-length trousers in soft cotton twill. High paper bag waist with a detachable tie belt and elastication at the back, fake fly with decorative buttons, side pockets and tapered legs.
Swim pants and a swim top in UV-protective fabric. Patterned top with long raglan sleeves. Bottoms with a frill at the top and lined gusset. UPF 50.
Pyjama bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and tapered legs.

Short jacket in soft cotton twill with a drawstring hood, concealed press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with press-studs. Covered elastication at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Kaftan in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck front and back and open sides that can be fastened with a button on each side. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in a felted weave with a lined hood and zip with a pendant at the front. Welt side pockets, a zipped sleeve pocket with a pendant and elastication at the cuffs and back of the hem. Lined.
Warm-lined boots in imitation suede with a knee-high shaft. Elastic and a zip on one side, fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band and bow. Lined. Width of brim. 4 cm.
Mules with pointed toes and a short slit at the front. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fitted top in textured jersey with a slight sheen. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and long puff sleeves.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and pair of dungaree shorts in soft cotton denim. Patterned T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y). Dungaree shorts with a button at the sides and adjustable, elasticated straps with a button. Open chest pocket with a small fabric appliqué and concealed press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Straight-cut, ankle-length dress in a softly draping patterned weave. Small, frill-trimmed V-neck opening at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Strapless jersey dress with an elasticated waist. Inner top with elastication at the top.
Fine-knit socks.
Metal earrings with fabric-covered hoops and tassels. Length 18 cm.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping, pleated satin with a visible, elasticated, ribbed waistband. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Rain coat in functional, waterproof fabric with sealed seams, a fleece-lined stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Flap patch pockets, press-studs at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The coat has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short-sleeved top in a rib knit with a ribbed trim around the neckline. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Cap in cotton twill with embroidered text. Adjustable tab and clip fastener at the back.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with welded seams, reflective details and a detachable, fleece-lined hood with an elasticated edge. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, padded raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Fleece lining front and back, and a woven lining in the sleeves. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Calf-length, bell-shaped lace skirt with a high waist. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Lined.
Short-sleeved body in stretch ribbed viscose jersey with a low back and lined gusset with press-studs.

Dungaree shorts in soft, washed, patterned denim with a chest pocket, straps with adjustable fasteners and a seam at the waist with press-studs. Fake side and back pockets and a fake fly. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-2Y).
